lines.text: [Shad appears besides Erin's car while Darrell is holding her at knifepoint inside it]
Drop the knife! You got 'til three. One...
Suck my dick!
Whip the little fella out. Two...

[brandishes the knife at Shad]
This here's a domestic squabble...!
[Shad seizes his knife hand and wrenches his arm over the window jam, snapping the bone. Darrell screams]
Three.
You broke my arm!
You sure?
I can't still be working here when I go to court. "Oh yes your honor; I found a new job... I'm working at the Eager Beaver!"
Well, up until 8 weeks ago, I worked for the FBI Miami... secretary... until I got fired for having a defective husband.
I am the Congressman's right hand.
You must be a very busy man.
You got my daughter, and now you try and kill me with a ax.
I don't have your daughter, you're confused! And it's "*an* ax."
What are you, nuts?
Yeah, psycho. Delusions of invincibility combined with a strong homicidal urge. I have a kick-your-ass fetish.

[practicing in front of a mirror]
Hello, Erin. My name is Congressman Dilbeck. You are... you're a beauty.
[Erin enters the salon behind him; Dilbeck turns and stares]
Good evening. I'm Erin Grant.
[Dilbeck nods dumbly]

[little laugh]
And you must be...

[stuttering]
Con... Comback Dilbeck. Uh, uh, Con-Congressman, uh, Dildo.
[laughs nervously]
I am... Congressman David Dilbeck. And welcome, welcome.
Are you Ms. Grant?

[sarcastically]
No, I'm Barbara Bush.

[to Shad]
And you are?
George Bush.

[after Dilbeck grabs her]
Finally you take me like a man, like a... Congress man!
You talk to her?
Darrell's phone's disconnected. I think he moved again.
You know, I'd embrace the opportunity to maim his white ass up.
I know you would, and that's really thoughtful, but I don't think it would help my case in court if I had him attacked.
[about going after Erin without police backup]
So we're it? A cop and a bouncer?
Plus two strippers and a kid. We're in great shape.
You don't know how much I love you. I even sent my man Erb to collect your lint!
My *lint*?
Fresh, hot lint!
And what did you do with that fresh, hot lint?
Well, I'm afraid I made love to it.

[Shad has just put a roach in a container of yogurt]
So, this is the new brainstorm, huh?

Accordin' to the Wall St. Journal we got here the hottest selling yogurt in the country. I bring this in, say my hair fell out from the shock. BOOM! They pay off big time. My lawyer thinks it's a genius idea.
Your lawyer has an office over a video store.
Call me a dreamer. I don't wanna be a bouncer forever.
Do you follow politics, Mr. Shad?
Do I look like I follow politics?
I'm about to mount this here filly!
[Erin pulls out a gun]
Maybe not.
If I come back tomorrow, can we talk more about my case?
We can talk about anything you want, long as you're naked.
See, I just love naked women. It's a character flaw.
I'm stoned, but I ain't confused!
Hey, are you that guy from Price is Right?
No! I'm Congressman David Dilbeck!
Congressman? No shit! Well, I steal wheelchairs, so we got a lot in common.
"Free Willy" back yet?
Still out.
People are pigs! Sit on movies like they own 'em!
I don't need no stripper to telling me how to live!

[seizes Erin from behind and holds a knife to her neck]
Evenin', everybody!
Oh, shoot!
Where's my little 'un?
Where you can't get her.
Is that ever the wrong answer. Now you bring her to me right now!
I am not bringing her to you anywere in this lifetime.
Well, then I guess I'll just have to go to that nice old judge and tell him my whore of a wife has abducted...
Well, guess what, Darell? The judge is dead! So if you want Angela, then you're just going to have to kill me. Go on!
Think I'm afraid to? You think I don't have the manliness to take your life?
Oh no, honey, you know what, I think you are all man. That death row lethal injection thing? Nah, come on, that's not gonna scare you!

[hesitates, then]
They'd never execute a daddy.
No?
This is a major disaster! Major! Unbelievable! Without doubt, the most ludicrous piece of human behavior...
It's never gonna happen again, Malcolm. I've got it under control. See, I just love naked women. It's a character flaw. And God's testing me now...
Oh, will you shut up, you idiot!
You can't talk to me like that. I'm a United States Congressman!

I can't? When you go psycho in a girlie bar six weeks before the election, what should I call you? Winston Freaking Churchill? It was all I could do to keep Willie Rojo from coming in here and strangling you with his bare, freaking hands!
Everybody has a bad night, especially if they're under the pressure, like we are, under the public eye of...! Who recognized me?
His name is Jerry Killian. And he's waiting outside.
Now?
Now! We gotta move on this thing before we get eaten alive!
Move on what? I mean, if this is a shakedown, just get Willie to pay him like he always does. Why drag me into it...?
Because... it's not about money.
It's not?
No. He wants you to persuade Judge Fingerhut to reverse a child custody case, of some stripper.
Who he's sleeping with? You know, this is disgraceful! This is disgraceful, to have a man, like me, who has to deal with...!
He's not sleeping with her.

[stops, uncomprehending]
Well, then why... why does her care?
Because he's nuts! That's why he's dangerous! I mean, if he was sleeping with her, then I could deal with him, man-to-man, but this is... this is fruitcake love here.
My brain has just turned to shit...
Well hey, that's why you're in Congress!
That doesn't look like a regular visitation, does it Erb?
[When Dilbeck fails to appear on stage at a fundraiser, Erb rushes into his hotel suite, looking for him]

[motioning to the bedroom]
Get him out of there. Preferably with his clothes on.
David...
[sees Dilbeck's attire]
Oh, my God! Tell me I'm dreaming. No, no, I cannot believe this! No, no, no, Davey, *no*!
Is this lint fresh?
Hot out of the Maytag.
Oh!
[inhales deeply]
You just can't imagine! This is the very essence of that glorious creature!
Why are you all shiny?
It's Vaseline.
Oh... oh! It's... great, it's Vaseline!
You've never covered yourself with Vaseline?
No, no, not unless I have third degree burns, no.
You don't know what you're missing. I've got it all over. It's down in my boots. I can feel it squishing between my toes...
[Orly hires Lorelei and her trained python away from the Flesh Farm, only they send the snake's dead body]
Here, go rustle up a new snake.
Where, the AM/PM? Who the fuck carries pythons at ten o'clock at night?
There's an all-night snake farm on Route 27. Ask for Jungle Juan. And get rid of that thing! God, I hate this business! You know why? It's lost its humanity.
[at the boat, Darrell peeps at Erin dancing for congressman Dilbeck]
Well, there's a sight to raise the dead. Who's that old freak? Hold on a second. I know who that is. Is that the...? Hey, is that that guy from "Price is Right"?

[in the morgue]
Now here comes that brilliant and charming attorney of yours, Mr. Mordecai. Found him 400 yards offshore. Now show him the rest of his kisser.

[uncovers Mordecai's face]
Crabs find lawyers a particular delicacy, yeah.
Looks like lasagna. Cover that shit up.
You mind telling me why your name was on his calendar for tomorrow?
I was involved in a litigation with a yogurt company.

Just based on my limited experience, this doesn't look like the sort of thing a yogurt company would ordinarily do. You know, I hear this prick represented the same poor kid who got mauled at your club. Now that I find fascinating, Shad!
He had a picture...
[retching]
Man, I'm gonna lose it!
[the coroner starts to cover Mordecai's face, Garcia stops him]
A picture of what? A certain legislator?
Yeah... beatin' the kid's ass.
And where's the original?
I got no idea.
[the coroner covers up Mordecai, Garcia hands Shad a box of mints]
Here, freshen up. Thanks.
Can I interest you in dessert?
No, just the check.
[the coroner laughs and wheels Mordecai away]

[about Erin]
Dilbeck didn't invite her back?
She said no.
Well, that's good. Because I don't think she should go back there, even with you. And what was with her tonight? She seemed edgy.
She got her moods, man. Could be that time of the month.
So now you're the gynecologist-bouncer, bouncer-gynecologist?
Hey! I just watch out for the girls.

Wow... so do I. That makes a grand total of two people in the entire state of Florida. Because the higher-ups in my department, they're not exactly pushing this investigation. Is any of this making sense to you?
Because of this asshole Congressman.
Bingo! We've got two homicides here, and nobody gives a shit except you and me. And I'm worried about that girl. She's all alone out there.
I said no sugar.
[faints]

Angela]
Why don't you drop her off at our house?
I can't do that.
Why not? I told Donna everything. Your whole situation. She said if you needed a hand she'd love to help.
She doesn't think I'm something out of "A Current Affair"?

Erin, come on, you're a terrific girl. You know that, right? So you made a mistake a lot of terrific girls make, you married a bum. What are you gonna do? You gonna beat yourself up for the rest of your life?
